TopicTitle: Meet the Moska! A compact training aircraft

Articles.Content:
I wanted a compact and maneuverable aircraft, so I took Aeris 3A and modified into this little funny plane.

I call it Aeris 2A, "Moska"

![VQhc4Sx.png](http://i.imgur.com/VQhc4Sx.png)

and I made a video showing some things to do with it:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/i9DREx1vFeY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

[download at KerbalX](http://kerbalx.com/ricardo/Aeris-2A-Moska)

have fun ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

You could say it's got an air... ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif) ...chintake.

Cute little critter though, what sort of range/speeds can it handle?

> 
> You could say it's got an air... ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif) ...chintake.
> Cute little critter though, what sort of range/speeds can it handle?

Not much more than mach 1. It's more acrobatic than range or speed. I tested with FAR and its not so stable with the mod ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> I wanted a compact and maneuverable aircraft, so I took Aeris 3A and modified into this little funny plane.
> I call it Aeris 2A, "Moska"

Nice flying in your video! Do you use a mod to make it sound that way? My jets don't tend to sound so good from inside the cockpit.

> 
> Nice flying in your video! Do you use a mod to make it sound that way? My jets don't tend to sound so good from inside the cockpit.

for the video I used G-effects and collision-FX
